snippet: Women in entertainment are obsessing less about their weight and setting their own standards of beauty.
abstract: Women in entertainment are obsessing less about their weight and setting their own standards of beauty; self-acceptance has become a new form of defiance on television, especially among a new breed of younger female comedians who are looking for a fresh twist in a landscape where profanity, obscenity and intolerance have little comic shock value left.
lead_paragraph: Women in entertainment are obsessing less about their weight and setting their own standards of beauty.

headline.seo: Women on TV Step Off the Scale
headline.main: Female Stars Step Off the Scale
headline.print_headline: Female Stars Step Off The Scale
